testsuite.name: A description

testcase.name: Create and open match on test league

testsuite.system-out: @regression Scenario: Create and open match on test league # src/test/resources/pool/backoffice/CreateAndOpenMatch.feature:14 match value null Given I clear the pool match data # steps.ClearTestData.iClearTheMatchTestDataOnPool() username and passowrd is andre@Clickplay1 And I logged in at pool backoffice https://staging-admin.cpp555.com # steps.pool.backoffice.Login.iLoggedInAtPoolBackoffice(java.lang.String,io.cucumber.datatable.DataTable) | Username | Password | | andre | @Clickplay1 | Given I click the games header dropdown # steps.pool.backoffice.CreateOpenTestMatch.iClickTheGamesHeaderDropdown() When I click matches # steps.pool.backoffice.CreateOpenTestMatch.iClickMatches() And I click the create match button # steps.pool.backoffice.CreateOpenTestMatch.iClickTheCreateMatchButton() And I input match details # steps.pool.backoffice.CreateOpenTestMatch.iInputMatchDetails(io.cucumber.datatable.DataTable) | Sport | League | Match count | | Automation Sports | Test League | 1 | And I click submit button # steps.pool.backoffice.CreateOpenTestMatch.iClickSubmitButton() And I select view match details from action dropdown # steps.pool.backoffice.CreateOpenTestMatch.iSelectViewMatchDetailsFromActionDropdown() And I click open bet status # steps.pool.backoffice.CreateOpenTestMatch.iClickOpenBetStatus() Then match is open # steps.pool.backoffice.CreateOpenTestMatch.matchIsOpen()
